hero.subtitle: Application-Only · Elite Results · Top Performers
hero.description: We train the top 1% of 18 to 30 year olds and turn them into 6-figure closers. This isn't for everyone. It's for those who refuse to settle.

opportunity.title: THE OPPORTUNITY
opportunity.description: This isn't a course. This is a career transformation. See what's possible when you learn from the best and get placed in high-ticket door-to-door and business-to-business sales roles.

averageSummer.label: AVERAGE SUMMER
averageSummer.description: What our students typically earn during their first summer in door-to-door and B2B sales

topPerformer.label: TOP PERFORMER
topPerformer.description: Elite closers who maximize their potential

commissionOnly.label: COMMISSION-ONLY
commissionOnly.description: You earn what you close. No caps, no limits.

scale.label: PERFORMANCE-BASED
scale.description: Upgrade your commission rate based on your performance. The more sales you make and the more effort you put in, the higher your commission can become.

levelOne.title: Level One
levelOne.description: Your foundation. Master the fundamentals and start closing deals.
levelOne.requirements: Complete training and close your first clients

levelTwo.title: Level Two
levelTwo.description: Prove your consistency. Hit your targets and show you're serious.
levelTwo.requirements: Close a certain number of clients or reach revenue targets

levelThree.title: Level Three
levelThree.description: You're in the top tier. Consistent performance at the highest level.
levelThree.requirements: Exceed Level 2 targets and maintain exceptional performance

eliteLevel.title: Elite Level
eliteLevel.description: The pinnacle. Unlock the ultimate rewards reserved for the best.
eliteLevel.requirements: Achieve elite performance metrics and close record-breaking numbers

travel.title: ELITE Travel Experience
travel.description: When you perform at the highest level, you deserve experiences that match your success. Our top closers enjoy premium travel, curated accommodations, and VIP access to the world's best destinations.

curatedAccommodations.title: Curated Accommodations
curatedAccommodations.description: From boutique hotels to premium resorts, we handpick stays that match your style. Quality over labels. Every destination offers something special.

exclusiveDestinations.title: Exclusive Destinations
exclusiveDestinations.description: Train in world-class locations. From Las Vegas to Miami, Dubai to Monaco. Wherever closers thrive.

premiumTravel.title: Premium Travel
premiumTravel.description: Business class upgrades, priority boarding, and seamless connections. Travel comfortably and arrive ready to perform.

vipExperiences.title: VIP Experiences
vipExperiences.description: Access to exclusive events, fine dining, and networking opportunities reserved for the elite.

earnYourWay.title: Earn Your Way to the Top
earnYourWay.description: These experiences aren't given. They're earned. Close deals, hit targets, and unlock access to the most exclusive travel experiences in the industry.
earnYourWay.learnMore: Learn more about the travel experience

curriculum.title: What is
curriculum.description: How Wildcard Growth works, and why it's the smartest move for proven closers ready to level up.

origin.title: Origin
origin.description: Born from real-world success. Wildcard Growth was created by Sam from Wild Card Agency. It was built specifically for internal recruitment. This isn't theory. It's a proven system that transformed top performers into an elite force. When you join, you're stepping into a legacy built by closers, for closers.

recruitmentModel.title: Recruitment Model
recruitmentModel.description: We don't train from scratch. We recruit winners. Our model is simple: we identify candidates who already have proven skills on the ground. No endless training cycles. We bring in closers who can perform from day one. If you've got the hustle, we've got the opportunity. Your track record speaks, and we listen.

selectionProcess.title: Selection Process
selectionProcess.description: Our selection process isn't like other programs. It's designed to guarantee results, not just hope for them. We evaluate candidates through a unique, rigorous process that ensures you're set up for success from the start. When you're accepted, you're not just getting a spot. You're getting a guaranteed pathway to results.

professionalIntegration.title: Professional Integration ALL-IN
professionalIntegration.description: From day one, you're ALL-IN. Intensive support. Competitive commission rates. Real conditions to prove your skills and get paid for them. We don't make you wait. We evaluate you in the field, reward you for performance, and set you up to win. Your success is our success from the moment you start.

b2b.title: B2B (Business-to-Business)
b2b.description: B2B sales means selling products or services directly to other businesses. This is where the big deals happen. You're working with decision-makers, negotiating contracts, and closing high-value transactions. B2B closers understand complex sales cycles, build relationships with key stakeholders, and deliver solutions that drive business results. If you thrive on strategic thinking and high-stakes negotiations, B2B is your arena.

d2d.title: D2D (Door-to-Door)
d2d.description: D2D sales is the ultimate test of resilience and persuasion. You're on the front lines, face-to-face with prospects, handling objections in real-time, and closing deals on the spot. D2D closers have unmatched confidence, can read people instantly, and turn rejections into opportunities. This is where you prove you can sell anything, anywhere, to anyone. If you want to master the fundamentals and build unshakeable closing skills, D2D is where legends are made.

freeTraining.a: Yes. It's completely free for 2026. Starting in 2027, there will be a fee to join.

getStarted.a: The first step is to book a Zoom call at the bottom of this page. The second step is to show up to the call. That's all you need to do.

timeCommitment.a: This is a career, not a side gig. Expect full-time intensity with full-time rewards.

experienceRequired.a: No, it's not required at all. We even like people who don't have sales experience yet. We train them the Wildcard way.

joinTeam.q: Is there an opportunity to join your team?
joinTeam.a: Yes. If you prove yourself, there are opportunities to join the team.

b2bD2d.a: Door-to-door (D2D) means selling directly to homeowners at their doorstep. Think energy, solar, security, roofing, and more. B2B (business-to-business) means selling to companies instead of consumers. Think software, insurance, telecom, office supplies, and services that help businesses run. Both are high-earning sales paths we train for.

booking.title: Schedule Your 1-Hour Strategy Session
booking.description: Pick a time that works for you. No commitment required.

footer.description: Elite sales training for door-to-door and B2B closers. Go from zero to six figures.

eliteLevels.title: How to Reach
eliteLevels.description: Progress through four levels by closing deals and hitting revenue targets. Elite level unlocks access to the travel experience.

readyToStart.title: Ready to Start Your Journey?
readyToStart.description: Every elite closer started at Level One. Apply now to begin.

eliteExperience.title: ELITE Experience
eliteExperience.description: When you perform at the highest level, you deserve experiences that match your success. The Elite Experience is our way of rewarding top closers with premium travel, curated accommodations, and VIP access to the world's best destinations.

whatIs.title: What Is The Elite Experience?
whatIs.description1: The Elite Experience is our exclusive reward program for top-performing closers. It's not just about travel. It's about recognizing excellence and providing the lifestyle that matches your performance.
whatIs.description2: When you reach Elite Level, you unlock access to premium travel, curated accommodations, exclusive destinations, and VIP experiences that most people only dream about. This is how we invest in our best performers.

howToReach.title: How To Reach Elite Level
howToReach.description: The Elite Experience isn't given. It's earned. To unlock access, you need to reach Elite Level by:

closeDeals.text: Hit your targets month after month and prove you're a top performer.

exceedRevenue.text: Go beyond expectations and close record-breaking numbers.

maintainElite.text: Consistency is key. Elite Level requires sustained excellence.

howToReach.specificTargets: Specific targets and requirements are disclosed upon program acceptance. We track your performance and automatically upgrade you when you qualify.

dayInTheLife.title: DAY IN THE LIFE
dayInTheLife.subtitle: D2D EDITION
dayInTheLife.description: A typical day as a Wildcard Growth closer — door-to-door edition.
dayInTheLife.knockingDescription: Full day in the field, knocking doors and closing deals.
dayInTheLife.returnDescription: Sales and goals written on the boards
dayInTheLife.goodOrBadWeather: Good or bad weather, we KNOCK!!

trips.title: Our
trips.description: See where our top closers have traveled. These are real experiences from our Elite program: luxury destinations, exclusive resorts, and memories that last a lifetime.

puntaCana.description: Our closers experienced paradise in Punta Cana: white sand beaches, crystal-clear waters, and world-class resorts. This trip rewarded top performers with the luxury getaway they earned.

wantToJoin.title: Want to Join the Next Trip?
wantToJoin.description: Earn your way to Elite Level and unlock access to our next luxury destination.

wildcardEvents.title: Wildcard Events
wildcardEvents.description: Join us for exclusive in-person events where elite closers train, compete, and network.
